timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,10 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1087 net/minecraft/client/render/model/BakedModel + METHOD method_24304 isSideLit ()Z + COMMENT Allows control of the lighting when rendering a model in a GUI. + COMMENT

+ COMMENT True, the model will be lit from the side, like a block. + COMMENT

+ COMMENT False, the model will be lit from the font, like an item.
